alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:01PM MDT until June 29 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN HARDING AND NORTHWESTERN BUTTE COUNTIES... At 500 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Buffalo to 5 miles southwest of East Short Pines to 10 miles northwest of Antelope Butte, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... East Short Pines around 510 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Redig, Crow Buttes, Haystack Buttes, Slim Buttes and Reva. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
